string.text: Fool's loot
On the way to Sid, I saw a goofball hide his loot while running around like a headless chicken. I should look for it under the roof, might have something of use.
Village log

At this point, they're just taking the piss out of us. The jarheads once again had me suppressed with that damn machine gun of theirs, so I had to leave on all fours. Had to hide my loot in a log 'cause it was just too heavy. I'll pick it up at night.
Strapless backpack
I was walking along the road, drunk as a skunk and swinging my backpack around... Long story short, the strap tore off and the backpack flew onto a rooftop. I'll go look for a ladder.
UAZ safe
There's a hidden safe in the UAZ on the road. I'll drop off stuff I don't need there and come back later.
Tree loot
This tree right here is the shit. Perfect place for hiding stuff. Not a single soul's gonna find it.
Under the wheels
The boys and I had this one stalker say bye-bye to his belongings. His PDA had the the coordinates to some stash, says it's located under a couple of wheels.
Backpack in mill
I escaped the jarheads and bolted to the mill. Hid my backpack there. They're close, not sure I'll get away...
Hidden flowerbed
I ran onto a flowerbed along the track and left all my stuff inside of it. I'm not too worried about it, as the army will keep it safe.
In the tunnel bushes
Found a pretty good spot in the tunnel for leaving my loot. I'll pick it up once I come back.
Electric barrel
Someone explain to me why the hell those jarheads deserve having their palms greased? I'll go through the anomalies as usual... and hide my loot while I'm at it.
Anomalous rocks

This one stalker got popped a while ago. On him, I found the coordinates to a stash where there's some fancy anomalous jacket. An anomalous jacket among anomalous rocks. I just stuffed my anomalous things there.
Stalker grave
I left my deceased comrade a few things for storage. Hope no one touches them.
In the bushes at the checkpoint
I'll hide some of my loot at the checkpoint leading to the Garbage. My backpack just can't handle the load.
Army stash
The patrol put me in a tight spot, so I had to take 'em out. The stuff I gathered from the bodies are hidden right around the corner.
Hideaway in tree stump
I put the stuff in a tree stump. Look for the radioactive truck.
Radioactive basement

I found some ginormous box, probably from the truck that was carrying corpses two years ago. I'm just wondering who in the world brought it into this basement? In any case, I left my loot in that box. Somewhat radioactive there, but that's alright — it'll scare off others.
Pipe in bushes
I found a metal pipe. I'll leave some extra stuff there.
Stash in panel board
I saw a rookie hide his knick-knacks in a nearby panel board. I should check out what exactly those knick-knacks might be.
Underwater hatch
No idea who or what the hatch in the muddy water is intended for, but it's perfectly hidden away from prying eyes. I'll hide my loot there.
Tree stump by the road
I found a stalker body with loot to boot. He's also got a stash that I'll check later.
Stash in the barrel
I'm not one to go pocketing, but I'll let surplus mutual equipment stay in the RAF van.
Stinking garage
That's a real stench in there, coming from the dead jarhead. Guy's already decomposing... but, who cares. Means nobody'll try snooping around there. I'll stash my loot where it's nastiest.
Tunnel in the Dark Valley
While I hunt down artifacts in the tunnel, I'll drop my backpack in the bushes. Wouldn't want to weigh myself down.
Boss' grave
I tucked away some loot in the boss' grave. If anyone tries anything, he'll raise up from the dead... and beat the living daylights out of the living! Hehehe.
Lonely cross
I found the isolated grave of a stalker. Hid some loot there, nobody's gonna think to take a look.
Hidden log
There's a log next to the mill, near the cistern. Hid some extra loot there.
In the tree
I threw my backpack onto the tree. If I have trouble getting there, imagine the fun others will have.
Under wagon
I'll make a stash under the wagon. Can't carry everything.
KAMAZ trunk
There's a stash in the KAMAZ trunk with some decent loot.
Two wagons
There are two wagons in the vicinity. One of them contains a hidden stash.
Backpack at vehicle station
There's a stash at the vehicle station, hidden real tight. Contains good loot.
Safe at farm
There's a pretty decent stash in a small safe at the farm house.
Living hell
There's a stash nearby... in an anomaly. But it's worth the effort getting there.
Under bridge
The jarheads have a stash close at hand, but it's hard to find.
